text: Donna Wills Scheeder (November 8, 1947 â€“ March 7, 2022) was an American librarian. She was president of the International Federation of Library Associations and Institutions (IFLA) from 2015 to 2017. Scheeder was born in Buffalo, New York. Scheeder died from cancer at her home in Washington, D.C. on March 7, 2022, at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from Buffalo, New York Category:People from Washington, D.C. Category:Cancer deaths in Washington, D.C.
title: Donna Scheeder
